remarks: Ordered pair membership in an ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
opelopab2.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopab2.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opelopab2 $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d ch x y $.
